name: Stock - Site Report
query:
SELECT
    site.name AS "Site ID:Link/Site:120",
    site.circuit_id AS "Circuit ID:Data:120",
    site.site_name AS "Site Name:Data:150",
    site.customer AS "Customer:Link/Customer:120",
    site.site_type AS "Site Type:Data:100",
    site.customer_type AS "Customer Type:Data:100",
    site.site_status AS "Site Status:Data:100",
    site.stage AS "Stage:Data:100",
    site.order_type AS "Order Type:Data:100",
    site.exiting_circuit_id AS "Exiting Circuit ID:Data:120",
    site.solution_code AS "Solution Code:Data:100",
    site.solution_name AS "Solution Name:Data:100",    
    site.service_provider AS "Service Provider:Data:100",
    site.awb_number AS "AWB Number:Data:100",
    site.pickup_date AS "Pickup Date:Date:100",
    site.delivery_date AS "Delivery Date:Date:100",
    site.tracking_status AS "Tracking Status:Data:100",
    site.carrier AS "Carrier:Data:100",
    site.carrier_service AS "Carrier Service:Data:100",    
    si.item_code AS "Item Code:Data:120",
    si.item_name AS "Item Name:Data:120",
    si.qty AS "Quantity:Int:80",
    si.status AS "Item Status:Data:100",
    si.serial_no_sim_no AS "Serial/SIM No:Data:150",
    si.brand AS "Brand:Data:120",
    si.mobile_no AS "Mobile No:Data:120",
    si.data_plan AS "Data Plan:Data:120",
    si.rental_plan AS "Rental Plan:Data:120",
    sm.delivery_requested_date AS "Delivery Requested Date:Date:120",
    DATEDIFF(site.pickup_date, sm.delivery_requested_date) AS "Material Ageing (Days):Int:100",
    DATEDIFF(site.delivery_date, site.pickup_date) AS "Ageing Shipment Delivery (Days):Int:100"
FROM
    `tabSite` site
LEFT JOIN
    `tabSite Item` si ON si.parent = site.name
LEFT JOIN
    `tabStock Management` sm ON sm.circuit_id = site.circuit_id
WHERE
    site.docstatus < 2
ORDER BY
    site.creation DESC
